abstract.para: This document gives an introduction to building your own applications for the &orocos; ( Open RObot COntrol Software ) project using existing Orocos components.

chapter.title: How to Read this Manual
chapter.para: This manual is for Software developers who wish to use, combine and extend software components of the Orocos framework. The Orocos hardware abstraction is included as well to describe the hardware interface some common Orocos components expect.

section.title: Deploying Components
section.para: This Chapter explains how to deploy Orocos Components in an application environment.

section.title: Component Reference
section.para: This Chapter lists the available 'ready to use' Orocos components which may be connected to setup an application.

section.title: Programming Applications
section.para: The Orocos Scripting Chapter details how to write programs and state machines which interact with your components. As such you can 'inject' the application logic in one or more components.
